title: Executive Order-Restoring Portion of White Mountain Indian Reservation to Public Domain
content: It is hereby ordered that all that portion of the White Mountain Indian Reservation in Arizona Territory lying east of 109 degrees 30 minutes west longitude be restored to the public domain.
citation: Ulysses S. Grant, Executive Order-Restoring Portion of White Mountain Indian Reservation to Public Domain Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371215
